融.definition: to melt; to thaw; to blend; to merge; to be in harmony

融入.definition: to blend into; to integrate; to assimilate; to merge

融化.definition: to melt; to thaw; to dissolve; to blend into; to combine; to fuse

融合.definition: a mixture; an amalgam; fusion; welding together; to be in harmony with (nature); to harmonize with; to fit in

融合為一.definition: to form a cohesive whole; to fuse together

融安.definition: Rong'an county in Liuzhou 柳州[Liu3 zhou1], Guangxi

融安縣.definition: Rong'an county in Liuzhou 柳州[Liu3 zhou1], Guangxi

融會.definition: to blend; to integrate; to amalgamate; to fuse

融會貫通.definition: to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas

融梗.definition: (neologism c. 2018) to incorporate ideas or material from sb else's creative work in one's own work

融水苗族自治縣.pinyin: Rong2 shui3 Miao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
融水苗族自治縣.definition: Rongshui Miao Autonomous County in Liuzhou 柳州[Liu3 zhou1], Guangxi

融洽.definition: harmonious; friendly relations; on good terms with one another

融爐.definition: a smelting furnace; fig. a melting pot

融解.definition: to melt; molten; fig. to understand thoroughly

融通.definition: to circulate; to flow (esp. capital); to intermingle; to merge; to become assimilated
